      • statusIcon

        public DocumentConfig statusIcon(LogStatus status,
                                 java.lang.String newIcon)
        Choose to use your own icons for log status (PASS, FAIL, WARNING etc.) by choosing one of the icons from Fontawesome website: http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/icons/.
        Parameters:
        status - LogStatus
        newIcon - Icon string from font-awesome
        Returns:
        DocumentConfig

      • displayCallerClass

        public DocumentConfig displayCallerClass(java.lang.Boolean display)
        Setting to append the caller class to the log event. By default, the setting is enabled to allow the caller class to be displayed
        Parameters:
        display - Shows the caller class in the report step
        Returns:
        DocumentConfig

      • setImageSize

        public DocumentConfig setImageSize(java.lang.String percent)
        Sets the size of the attached snapshots by percentage. Default = 50%.

        Usage: extent.setImageSize("40%");

        Parameters:
        percent - Size of the image in percentage
        Returns:
        DocumentConfig
